website_summaries.verdict: Offers a good fit and feel –particularly in the soles, although buyers may wish to consider buying up a half size.
pros: Sole is both thick for durability and soft for comfort
Great look and comes in a variety of colors
cons: Sizing runs on the small size
Some buyers claim that the boot isn't durable over the long run

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a cheap $20 pair of boots at Walmart and they were absolute garbage. I took them back, went to JC pennies and tried on a pair of these shoes that fit me. I then order that same size here on Amazon because they were cheaper than the ones at JC pennies. Anyways I use these boots for welding and they work awesome. They actually have weight to them and use really nice leather. Definitely some good bang for your buck. Really good color too
customer_reviews.author: James Butikofer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buy these. Great work boots or daily wear!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these my husband has gotten. He is a gravel train driver and loves the lightweight along with the sketchers comfort with the long days. His last pair lasted 8 months which for him is about 2 times longer than the CAT or craftsman we bought. On the other side my teen son asked for a pair after seeing them so A+ for styling. Update*** We have now purchase another pair for both husband and son, as well as a gift. They still are a favorite wear.
customer_reviews.author: MandaPanda

customer_reviews.title: boots do have a rubber sole very good. They are not WATERPROOF as stated I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered boots which stated WATERPROOF. Boots are heavy but I thought that would pass! boots do have a rubber sole very good. They are not WATERPROOF as stated I bought these for summer motorcycle riding and I do ride in the rain first rain storm hit my feet are soaked!!!. Do not purchase these boots if you do anything in water.
customer_reviews.author: BARRY T

customer_reviews.title: Different colors
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit kind of loose which I get because they are relaxed fit. The only compliant I have so far is that it looks like I was given to different color shoes... I may end up sending them back and going with a different shoe...
customer_reviews.author: Twitch.tv/ParoXitiC

customer_reviews.title: Men’s size 10 1/2 order size 11 comfy work boot !
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviews saying if you wear men’s size 10 1/2 order a size 11 boot for a good fit. I wore them outside in the pouring rain while working. Socks stayed dry no problem. Memory foam in the sole is a nice touch. Usually with boots I need to add gel insoles but not these boots. The 90 degree block heel is perfect for occupations that require them such as ladder climbers. Time will tell if they hold up but my first impression is very good !
customer_reviews.author: fitnessguy

customer_reviews.title: Love these.
customer_reviews.text: I do not wear anything but boots to work if I can help it. They just make the day better. These are great. Sketchers Brand almost never lets me down. The only complaint is that you sweat a little more because the material does not breath at all, and its left the shoes to give off a bit of an odor after a shorter time than I'd like to keep a shoe. Sometimes the skin of my feet is wrinkly cause of the moisture. They stay intact, and function well as a work boot. I'll get some odor eaters this time, but I will probably go back to the sketchers Pilot boot.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Clifton

customer_reviews.title: About average
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit well and are indeed water proof. It seems these days makers of work boots like to make the tongue come up to the level of the lacing area. Personally I like the tongue to come up a little higher, but that isn't the case with this pair of shoes. They feel a little heavy after about 4 or 5 hours, so I only wear them if absolutely necessary. Fair arch support although the balls of my feet feel a little tender after a few hours as well.
customer_reviews.author: Broderick A. Snow

customer_reviews.title: Little heavy but I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I seem to always migrate towards Skechers like a starting civilization would to a water source but for my footwear needs. Little heavy but that just means it's good for kicking.
customer_reviews.author: Carmine

customer_reviews.title: Durable boots
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of boots. They are a little stiff at first but very comfortable once broken in. I keep getting them for their durability and weatherproofing. I wear them so much that I wear out the sole and that is the only reason I have to get a new pair. The boots hold up (no delamination, even the laces hold up)
customer_reviews.author: Raymond A. Young Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Finally!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my husband who is on his feet 12 hours a day...on concrete too! I ordered a half size bigger as it was suggested in other comments I read. Good thing I did. My husband said by far these are the most comfortable shoes he has worn and they have made a huge difference in how he feels at the end of a long workday. He normally wears shoes out every 2-3 months. Will see how long these last.
customer_reviews.author: Karla G. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: First pair too small, second pair just right.
customer_reviews.text: First pair was a little small compared to boots from another maker. Returned and got next size up. Return procedure was very easy. Second pair seems to fit just right. Only had them a few days now, but break in period seems to be pretty short. I think they'll do well. I'll report as time goes by. I'll be interested in how they wear. From what I see they should do fine.
customer_reviews.author: A. Green

customer_reviews.title: Fits great for my husband - only slightly larger than expected.
customer_reviews.text: My husband needed a sturdy pair of boots but at a 154E shoe size, that's a bit hard to find in your everyday store. Thankfully these were available. We didn't expect them to fit as well as they did being that they're Sketchers (usually they run small) but these were even slightly larger than expected. It doesn't matter though - we kept them. They'll be a good option for winter or for business casual dress.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great boot for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a great boot that looks good. I read the reviews beforehand and the main issues mentioned were the overall height just above the ankle and the padding behind the rear arch above the heal. Anyone who normally wears boots know they’re not meant to be as soft as some shoes but they’re comfortable enough when on your feet. Main issue I noticed is when you’re driving with the way you position your foot near the accelerator/brake. That’s when you really notice the padding on the back of your arch above the heal. I’m hoping over time as the boot gets broken in that the padding gets worked in. Other than that, they’re great boots.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyWu

customer_reviews.title: Order a half size larger
customer_reviews.text: I did not heed the warnings in the reviews and I ordered my size since I never had a problem with Skecher brand shoes before but I was wrong. I've had them a little over a month and I think they are just now breaking in which is an issue I never had with Skecher. My walks are about 4mi per day. They feel more comfortable now. I don't think the tunge is long enough and there is no loop in the back to help put them on. Normal boot items. PROs - Well made and the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: Shrinking toe box
customer_reviews.text: Maybe okay for a desert climate but super heavy. In a humid climate wear the overnight grass in the morning is wet and so your boots unavoidably get wet don't buy these. The toe box shrinks causing ingrown nails and blistering. Also, you can sprain your ankle just falling off these boots. Something about them they just don't really secure to the foot correctly and you find yourself really tugging on the laces to get them to feel like they do--but they don't and if you step wrong on a stone or piece of lumber you will fall off your boots and twist an ankle. Buy RockRoosters if you want a comfortable boot with oversized toe box, not these.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Great for long hikes and they are waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son for a hiking trip that ended up being about 4 hours long. My son really likes them and says they are very comfortable. After hiking for 4 hours he said his feet didn't hurt at all. Plus, they are waterproof. Several places during our hike we actually had t walk through running water and shallow streams. He said his socks never got wet! Awesome!!! I would highly recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Zuhn

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the standard width boots, but found that they were very tight and returned them. I then purchased the extra-wide version and they were perfect. I often need a little extra width, but the regular width version seemed even tighter than normal so I think that these run narrow. That aside, I found these boots to be excellent. The leather is substantial, and the soles seem to be nice and thick. I think that these will last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mayes

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and light weight. I use them for work. My job provides me with a pair of red wings every year. They tend to be a little heavy but I love wearing them. However because I work a ton of hrs I like to buy a pair of go in between. These boots serve my purpose well though I would like them a bit wider.
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: 1st day I put them on all the rubber or idk what it is came off , fit really loose as well
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: These sketcher boots are super comfortable and didn't require any break in. I got them in and decided I would break them in and I wore them to a parade, they stayed comfortable the entire time and have never been uncomfortable at all, unlike shoes that you need to break in, they hurt your feet, these didn't. It was honestly the best $70 I've spent, especially when I went to a local store and saw they wanted $100+ for other similar boots.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Codere

customer_reviews.title: The boots hold up pretty well, first pair lasted about 2 years with ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I ordered through Amazon. Shipping was fast, quicker than quoted. The boots hold up pretty well, first pair lasted about 2 years with rugged wear. The second pair lasted about 2 years with rugged wear but the second pair separated at the upper and sole joint. It was time for a new pair so I didn't care. I'll probably buy another pair as they're comfortable, hold up well and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: L. Young

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME BOOTS! A GREAT DEAL!
customer_reviews.text: Just got my Skechers Mens Verdict boots. Only been wearing for two days, but had to write a review. Fantastic fit, (I wear a size 12D) exact size, and warm for a cold day, a little stiff but made very well. Super comfy, great insole cushioning, and waterproof to boot! (No pun intended) I recommend keeping the laces tight above the ankle prevents rubbing...which can hurt over time...awesome boots, a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping your feet dry for work
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my cousin who was in desperate need of a new pair of non-slip shoes for work. His last pair kept getting water inside of them after a few uses. We bought him these as they seemed like a higher quality and inexpensive pair. He loved them and says they are keeping his feet dry and by far the best pair of shoes he has ever owned for work. He is buying himself a second pair as backup. If you are looking for a great pair of non slip shoes, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Put To Use !
customer_reviews.text: I work in an auto salvage yard and I am outside EVERY day in ALL weather conditions and I also have tried all the big name work boots . These by far are the most durable without losing comfort or quality ! I wear these a week at my job and they look like they are months old between dirt / oil / antifreeze / etc. These are just an overall great work boot without the hefty tag and they hold up .. I am on my feet all day 6 days a week and up and down 50 times a day and they dont fall apart or wear pre maturely . A ++++ product !
customer_reviews.author: mike sesty

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes !
customer_reviews.text: I bought the boots for my son. They fit perfect, are comfortable and look great. Excellent quality. Delivery was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa L.

customer_reviews.title: First Impressions
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these boots for about a week and I'm impressed so far. I bought these for gardening/yardwork and so far they are really comfortable! I wear a size 12, the first day they were a little tight on the sides, but I can already tell they're starting to break in and loosen up a bit. After 5 days of use they now fit just how I like them. I ordered the dark brown and they look just like how they are pictured. Time will tell on the longevity of these boots, but they seem well constructed and sturdy. I will update my review at the end of the gardening season to report on how well they held up.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tested the waterproof feature yet, but overall it seems like a great quality boot for work or hiking. Yes, out of the box they are stiff. If you're not accustomed to these types of shoes, you may assume they're uncomfortable and rigid. You have to wear them consistently for about a week before they break in. For the money, I'm very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin N

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: These boots lasted 3 months and the insole is already worn out. These used to be my favorite boots but now that they have switched to memory foam, they are garbage. You can replace the insole if you are able to rip it all out because they glue them in very well and when you try it rips a lot of the stitching out. I will never buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: My honest opinion

customer_reviews.title: way too small
customer_reviews.text: i am size 10 eee. bought 10 eew. could hardly get my foot in..nice boot but i returned them...also, the lace up all the way to the top ( no hooks at the top) so you must unlace the top 6 ;or so x's to get your foot in ... i alway want hooks on the last two or three x's....
customer_reviews.author: billy bop bomber

customer_reviews.title: They are warm and waterproof (though I did apply some mink oil when I first got them) and relatively comfortable. I would sugges
customer_reviews.text: I've had these boots for about 6 months now. They are warm and waterproof (though I did apply some mink oil when I first got them) and relatively comfortable. I would suggest adding a quality insole from dr scholl or whatever because I wore these on a recent trip to Chicago for a few days, and they absolutely killed my feet from walking about 7 miles a day.
customer_reviews.author: john oconnor

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots for Montana Winters
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! I wear them almost daily in Montana, and they're worth double the $60 you're likely to pay. They're rugged, absolutely waterproof, and more importantly, COMFORTABLE. You won't find a better casual/work boot for anywhere near the money. Not my first pair, and definitely not the last Skechers I'll buy. These boots made me a fanboy of the brand. FYI: I bought the brown and black, and found the black to be a little tighter.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy, the size was not true, width was not true, very stiff leather, very stiff sole on bottom
customer_reviews.text: These boots are way TOO HEAVY, the size is not true, width is not true, and they are made of VERY stiff leather. I could not believe the weight of JUST ONE of these boots. Beware, the insole is not removable, so if you need to use arch supports etc. forget it. Also, the thick soles of these boots are VERY STIFF, as if they are made of some kind of thick very hard plastic kind of stuff I have never seen before. I was surprised because I have had several pair of Sketcher's shoes and the soles are on of the best features of them. So, I was very disappointed in these boots and sent them straight back.
customer_reviews.author: Peaceiscoming

customer_reviews.title: Fit well, seem durable and are semi-waterproof
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable, warm and kind of waterproof. They fit me perfectly and have a taller heel than I am used to, which is nice. They seem durable and less prone to scratching than my old Timerlands, but are leas waterproof than they were. The dark brown color is really nice and a welcome change from the ubiquitous wheat/nubuck boots.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: In my search for looking for a decent work boot I purchased a pair of red wing boots. Only a few days after purchasing them I returned them because of how badly they hurt my ankles and knees. In the meantime, I purchased these sketchers boots while I was looking for something else. I ended up really enjoying the boots and decided to keep them. They're everything that I need and they only cost a fraction of the red wing boots that I originally bought.
customer_reviews.author: Scarmona

customer_reviews.title: Good boot for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Got on sale for less than $60. I've had $30 boots and $200 boots, and after one weekend of clearing brush, These broke in easily and were confortable. Wear s think pair of socks your first couple times wearing, as they did rub on my heels, though not enough to cause blisters. The inserts are comfortable, and I had plenty of room for my feet. They may even run a touch big. My feet stayed dry working in tall/thick grass with a heavy dew on it. Overall, seems like a great value for a work boot. Would buy again. Meet and even exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Joe F

customer_reviews.title: Over all I'm happy with the boot and the price was reasonable compared ...
customer_reviews.text: The reviews said that the boots run small. I did not find this to be the case. I have a wide foot and high arch and found the boot to have plenty of room. I think the foot insert could be a little thicker. Over all I'm happy with the boot and the price was reasonable compared to other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Benison

customer_reviews.title: Really nice boot, but...
customer_reviews.text: These things are way heavier than I expected. They fit very well and quite comfortable. The styling, the reason I bought them, is also very nice. But these are heavier than one would think. I wore them to work once and that was pretty much the end of it for me. These are actually heavier than an old pair of leather work boots I have which simply amazed me. If you don't mind the weight, these are pretty nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Erich Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Boots are wide, not extra wide.
customer_reviews.text: My boots arrived a day early and I loved how they looked on my feet, but they fit in every spot except for the one part it's supposed to be designed to fit, the widest part of my foot. Because of this, I think the boots are just wide and falsly advertised as extra wide. It wasn't even the leather squeezing into the boot; the sole of the shoe itself is too small which causes it to dig into the sides of the bottom of my foot. Definitly go a half size up if you want to try them anyway. Definitly getting a refund for mine, though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Insane quality and comfortability.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best shoes I have ever bought, I am active and on the run all the time and I ride motorcycle, with this shoes I can go on a bike ride and go out at night without feeling I need to change my shoes, they are stylish super comfortable and super durable, I bought the black one 3 years ago and I loved it and I still have it in pretty good shape so I went with the brown. And as price it’s super affordable, you can’t beat that. I highly recommend it to anyone. As it will always end up the most comfortable shoes u have and wear all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Shady H.

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: After ordering nine pairs of boots for my husband since he has an odd size (9 or 9.5 extra wide) we found these. We had to send the other boots back as they were too narrow, too long, too big, too small, too tight or too wide. These fit him perfectly and he loves them. We hope they will last him a long time so we don't have to do this again any time soon! Great boots from a great company.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Cyd

customer_reviews.title: Best Wide Work Boots
customer_reviews.text: I own many Skechers shoes. Besides New Balance, Sketchers is the only consistent shoe maker that provides the width that my feet need. So happy to find these work boots with the extra width my feet need. I might have been able to get away with 10.5 instead of 11, but I prefer to have the extra space for thicker socks and my high arches. So far, after a month, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: JD Spurgin

customer_reviews.title: Sketchers = Comfort
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with Skechers, I have two pair of regular shoes, a steel toes non slip shoes now these boots. You can really feel the memory foam insoles which makes for a nice comfortable fit. The boots were darker than what the picture indicated but that could be just the contrast of the picture. If you want a comfortable boots for riding or winter activities then these are for you.
customer_reviews.author: Stargate310

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: I am typically an 11. I ordered an 11.5 because boots are stiff and I like the extra room. These boots were so tight. I thought it was due to the cushion being fresh and wanted to give it time to break them in. These shoes are still tight a month later and now I cannot return. If you buy these shoes, my advice would be to return them if they are too tight. They aren't going to break in and you will be stuck with boots you cannot return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great long lasting shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These are heavy but so great because they are waterproof and last forever. Shoes are also dated inside. Almost unbelievable my last ones are still my spare for rainy days and boat launchings...they are dated 2010. Yes, they are 10 years old. New ones are identical...same great quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: VegasBill

customer_reviews.title: Good looking boot
customer_reviews.text: Good looking boot. I bought these an the Ever boots to see which my son liked best. Though these look good I think he liked the more rugged look of the Ever boot. They were less expensive too so I was happy. I think these would have been a fine choice if my son liked this style more.
customer_reviews.author: Teebeem

customer_reviews.title: Toe Box
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product about 6/7 months ago. I only wear the shoe 3 times per week while doing yard work. The leather is coming apart at the bend of the toe, it's disappointing. I'd like to have a little more arch support in this shoe. I wouldn't buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Hushpuppy

customer_reviews.title: Great boot but size runs really small
customer_reviews.text: First pair I ordered was 10.5 and was tight, but thought new boots always tight. Wore them for a week and never gotbetter. Since I wore them I guess I couldn't return.. So I ordered size 11and there a little better. I have been buying this style in size 10.5 for last maybe 15+ years. Maybe it's the memory foam that makes them run small. They are really comfortable. In my case by me wasting money on first pair I could have saved some money by shopping local
customer_reviews.author: David Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Get min. 2 sizes bigger
customer_reviews.text: First set of boots where the size was smaller than others. I wear a 12 in three maybe four different brands. Got this pair for the price, got in grown toe nail and it was rubbing my big toe so bad it was starting to become raw. Worst part was it felt like I was walking on concrete the entire time.
customer_reviews.author: Jon R.

customer_reviews.title: So pleased
customer_reviews.text: Such a good looking boot....my husband who is so picky with his footwear just loves the look of this boot. We ordered a size up because of many reviews saying the boot runs small, I don’t know if that was necessary but I do know they fit very nicely. I have bought Sketchers for myself many times but this is my first purchase of Sketchers for my husband and I could not be happier. Thank you amazon
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Least Comforting boot I've ever had the displeasure of wearing.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a pair of boots to help my feet grip the soft earth of the wet terrain I live in. They look like they are up for that task but.....These things hurt the ankle and side of feet. They seem nice looking and all but man they hurt to wear. The "extra wides" are not 4E, more like a 3E at most. The quality seems nice for the price but the fact they run small and hurt to wear (even without them being narrow) I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tom A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with these Boots. I have Triple-E Wide Feet, and these Boots fit Perfectly. Also, I work on a Farm, and walk in Wet Grass every morning. These Boots are keeping my Feet, nice and dry, as there's nothing worse then Wet Feet. So they are Water-Proof as Advertised. And they are Very Comfortable to walk in, as I'm on my feet between 10 to 12 Hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A Piscitelli

customer_reviews.title: Best all around boot for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing bad to say about this product at all. I previously owned a pair about two years ago but I wore them out between two physically demanding jobs and winters. So I wanted to upgrade to a new pair and Amazon was able to accommodate with price and ideal size. What was great ordering this time around is that I was able to get my size in a wide whereas the old pair was just a regular fit. Since I have wide feet I'm glad that an online service is able to meet my requests more conveniently than shopping retail. At least I'll get more mileage out of this pair since I won't be wearing them ragged!
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes but not as they used to be
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are still pretty good but run a bit small, so it took me to wear them for 1-3 days to get them broken in. They feel like the upper is made of some synthetic framework covered in a thin layer of leather and the sole seems to be hollow and simply coated with rubber. Unfortunately, the overall quality is not that one it was some years ago. Seems like Skechers became a cheap Chinese subsidiary.
customer_reviews.author: Konstantin Manurin

customer_reviews.title: Great wide work boot without hardened toe.
customer_reviews.text: Ibhave WIDE feet, so fitment for shoes is always a struggle. These fit very good, a sight bit loose, but with thick socks will be perfect. I wear thin socks normally. I am developing a property, so these work perfect, whether wet or dry outside. The sole shank is awesome, no problems while working a shovel. Amd the price is AWESOME!!! I tried other boots at 2 and 3 times the price, so glad i found these on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Olguin

customer_reviews.title: Classic leather boots, but...
customer_reviews.text: Sole is reasonable soft when you walking even if is cold. Everything actually is good except size and insole. First the size, is really +1 from your regular. Mine is 10 so I took 11 and it fits exactly as 10 especially if you planning to wear thick sock. And second the insole, is not really comfortable and my feet sweat because of it. Besides the insole is glued, so you need to pull hard to tear it off. But be careful you can damage the part it glued to. I replaced it with this one  now is perfect shoe :)))
customer_reviews.author: Nick Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, looks good and is comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 11 and the sizing for this boot was perfect. I bought them for motorcycle riding and have only wore them once but I wore them all day. They were comfortable all day. I have foot issues (plantar ) and I didn't have any issues the whole day. Very nice boots. My other pair of Sketchers boots are tough and I'm not easy on them either and these boots seem to be made well too.
customer_reviews.author: Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is not standard. Be prepared to return.
customer_reviews.text: Sized insanely small. Ordered my correct size which leaves enough room for cushioned inserts and a extra pair of socks. Boots were too tight without any of that. Unfortunately was forced to wear one day so i cant return. Theyll go right in the donation bin.
customer_reviews.author: PGL.

customer_reviews.title: This review is way too late
customer_reviews.text: I've had these boots for 8 years now, and am wearing them as I write this. The soles wore out within 2 years, but I like these so much I replaced them with Vibram soles. They still keep my feet dry in the snow, and the uppers just keep going.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bierman

customer_reviews.title: Well built but uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: First let me say that these boots are built like a tank, unfortunately that's what they feel like on my feet. I have been wearing them for 3 months now and they never felt like they broke in, they are extremely stiff, not much support in the sole, and very snug. I bought the 10 wide width and they felt like a narrow width. I thought they would break in but they never really did, and I'm on a concrete floor for 11 - 12 hours per day. I really wanted to like these boots, they are well made and seem durable but after 3 months of sore feet I just ordered a different pair.
customer_reviews.author: william widlacki

customer_reviews.title: Fits Small
customer_reviews.text: When looking to buy this boot I referred to the Sizing Chart as well as Fitting Percentage, which well over 80% fitting as expected. I do not have a wide foot or need a wide toe box, and I wear a size 10 1/2 always. This boot does not fit true to size in the width...especially in the upper instep.
customer_reviews.author: CharlestonCasual

customer_reviews.title: Happy we bought these!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband. He loves them. Went to the mountains a few weeks after as a last minute getaway and he loved how these boots performed. We went ATV riding and zip lining up and down mountains and we walked in hiking trails. Definitely a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I would have done 5 stars all day, I love these boots, I have been bragging about them and I have had every boot know to man, I was just going to buy another pair to wear out as well as my work boots and saw that the price has gone from $56.99 to $74.99 and that is absolutely crazy in less than a years time, if you don't care about the price increase and you can afford them cool, but with my income I will be looking at a different boot now, too bad you had to get greedy....
customer_reviews.author: Robert N.

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I first bought these in black and liked them so much that I bought the brown as well. They run a tiny bit large so a good cushioned sock may be required for proper fitting. I have a moderately slim foot so that could be why as well. The leather is very high quality. They are almost a rust brown vs dark brown so if you want to darken them up it would be easy to do with brown shoe polish or leather oil.
customer_reviews.author: Peter H. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money! I thought I'd save a few bucks and try something less costly. Bad mistake; You get whatcha pay for. They are just a terribly uncomfortable boot. They are very stiff. And they don't breathe, at all, so your feet will sweat whether it's 35 or 75 out. And the sole is hard as a rock. If you're going to be on your feet a lot while wearing this boot, IT'S NOT FOR YOU. Every evening, after taking them off, I feel as if I have a deep bruise on my heels and the balls of my feet.
customer_reviews.author: David DeGrood

customer_reviews.title: not sure if that's good or not
customer_reviews.text: RE: Sketchers- two browns, one black, size 10 1/2: Just bought the 3rd pair of these for my husband, averaging 1 pair per year. He loves them, but wears them out within a year, not sure if that's good or not. This time the footbed separated completely from the sole in the toe area. Last pair, they seemed to wear down inside the boot right wear the balls of his feet are, at which time he has to buy some cushiony things & stick in there. All in all, seems fair to him for as much as he wears them verses cost.
customer_reviews.author: itscomplicated

customer_reviews.title: Bigfoots first good pair.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first pair of boots I finally got for myself that were extra wide. They are the first pair of comfortable boots regarding width. They run a little hot so I don't know how comfortable they will be in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey M. Lang

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Great boot for the price! I first bought the highest rated $40-$50 range boot on Amazon and it was complete garbage. I returned and spent a little more which was well worth it. I use them for working on our property and even after 10hr days my feet feel great. Dry, not sweating, no pains.
customer_reviews.author: R. Oden

customer_reviews.title: XW is bigger than EEE, so be advised
customer_reviews.text: I have a EEE wide foot. The collar around the ankles is so loose that it moves with respect to my ankle bone...creating a hot spot on the i side ankle bone. Don't know how to fix this other than wearing double socks. Leather has a strong smell, perhaps that will fade
customer_reviews.author: Fair Play

customer_reviews.title: No ventilation!
customer_reviews.text: After having these boots for several months I have found that my feet have no way to breathe. Never have I had such a problem with my feet sweating and boot stinking as with these. I already have to buy new boots, not because they are worn but because they stink!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It was my son's third purchase of these boots. They are all that he has worn for 4 years. The soles are nice and thick, and they are cushiony where they need be. What's more, they're very durable and handsome -- particularly in the dark brown. They were manufactured with integrity in Vietnam, and leave nothing to be desired. I simply cannot find anything negative to say about them. I wish that I could give them 6 stars!
customer_reviews.author: DSLR

customer_reviews.title: Great boots.  No waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This boot is very confortable. The rubber has good grip. The leather seems to be of good quality. My only complain is that this are not waterproof at all . I am working on a bronze foundry and the boots work perfectly until I step out in the snow. If waterproof I’ve given then 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Alex Reshuan-Nieto

customer_reviews.title: These boots are amazing. My work requires a 1inch heel and these ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots are amazing. My work requires a 1inch heel and these things are really comfy with the memory foam. We were required to wear loggers. So I'm pretty stoked that I don't have to spend 200+ on redwings anymore. If they last a year I'll be happy. The sizing was spot on I wear a 13 wide but I couldn't get the light brown in a wide so I wasn't too sure on what to expect but these fit like a glove. Not OJ'S glove but a glove😂 Check back in 6 months with an update.
customer_reviews.author: Jason T. Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Great work boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots have gotten wet and muddy, and are holding up well. They’re comfortable for all day wear. If you need waterproof boots, and want real leather, these are a reasonably priced option that should keep your feet happy.
customer_reviews.author: Grill master

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots by Sketchers.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of Sketchers, EVER! I'm an all TIMBERLAND kind of guy. But after spending over $ 350.00 on two pair of Timberlands this week, I realized I never bought a pair of Brown ones, but I also didn't want to spend another $200.00, so I tried these Sketchers out. I must say, I am not disappointed at all. They fit perfectly, and are very, very comfortable. Just what I needed in color, comfort and price. These boots were a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Fingerz

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: Had a pair of sketchers boots for many years. Decided to retire them and replace with these. They fit hreat, very comfortable, well made. Couldn't be happier. Hope to see the same length of life out of these too.
customer_reviews.author: Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Absolute beast of a shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. This is my third pair, each lasting about 3-4 years of constant wearing. As someone who lives in a snowy climate, it's great for those cold snow covered mornings. Feet never get wet, but still get a bit cold (not sure I can fault them for that though since they'll be surrounded by snow for 30 minutes cleaning off your car). Also look great as a normal day-to-day "shoe". However, if you're looking for something to go running in.... obviously not the shoe for you. You want something durable and waterproof. These guys are for you in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Good fit right from box!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for adult grandson. His foot isshort and extra wide so foot ware is hard to find locally. Bought these on the chance they would fit. The fit was just right with no break in time required! They seem to be of good quality and the price was half the cost of other boots previously purchased. Will update in a few months with lasting quality.
customer_reviews.author: D. Barr

customer_reviews.title: Rugged boot but not very water resistant
customer_reviews.text: I love my boots although I definitely notice some seepage when worn in a wet environment such as when walking through grass after a rain. I can see specific areas (about one or two per boot) that become darker when exposed to water which I assume are where it gets in. They are located along the crevice between the shoe leather in the front half and the rubber sole, and can probably be spot treated with some kind of water proofing material. Also, the faux leather 'cuff' around the top of the boot is pretty thin and may split eventually since my heel rubs pretty hard against it when I'm putting it on.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Smith

customer_reviews.title: These are replacing some Red Wing boots and so far so good. The Red Wings lasted a bit over 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: I work in these all day. I have narrow feet so the width is a bit wide but I use a marathoner lacing technique to overcome that. I have high arches so no matter what brand I buy I put my arch supports in place. These are replacing some Red Wing boots and so far so good. The Red Wings lasted a bit over 2 years after getting sent back for warranty repairs within the first year and then I performed the same repair again myself six months later. So, if these will last two years at a quarter of the cost of the Red Wings it's a steal! I hope they are warm in the winter. Will know soon.
customer_reviews.author: Olin K. Johnson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Love Them
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots just have to break them in a little. Like them so much I ordered a second pair in a different color. The padding around the ankles it's sort of aggravating but once you break them and you can tell they will be fine. I recommend these Boots like I said I ordered a second pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Burgess

customer_reviews.title: A OK
customer_reviews.text: Been buying these boots for about 5 years.I still have 2 others for around the house.All of them nice,well made.never separated.Only reason I buy a new pair,I need fresh grips.I work on roof tops as an AC tech.Inserts come out,so you can install your own arch supports if you prefer.Will buy forever if they're still being made.
customer_reviews.author: SDB

customer_reviews.title: Back of shoe to short
customer_reviews.text: When I wore theses shoes I immediately got a blister on the rear of my heel area, because the shoe is to short in the rear.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Fulton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, very comfortable, excellent, impervious to rain, 3 inches of snow & shallow water
customer_reviews.text: This the perfect boot for hiking, it's comfortable, I bought the extra wide width version, impervious to rain, walking through water up 2 to 3 inches, haven't tried anything deeper, and snow up to 3". If you're going to be in temperatures below 30° or so your good for 30-45 minutes. Excellent grip, ice is ice so not much help but what is except steel spike pullovers, great in snow. I've had several other brands & this boot is my favorite all season hiking boot
customer_reviews.author: dekker45

customer_reviews.title: Work boot
customer_reviews.text: I bought this boot to work in backyard while I take down trees, bushes, things of that nature. The boot is very heavy on your feet. You have to really make your foot move up to get the boot up. Would recommend a different one for those who want a lighter feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Well Made, No Snags, Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: It’s difficult to find fault with something as well made, comfortable, and inexpensive as these Skechers Men’s Verdict Boots. I especially love the eyelets and the tongues. As a paraglider, I have to avoid lace hooks and extraneous material that could snag lines. These look suitable to the occasional hike out of a remote LZ, while comfortable for everyday wear. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Swashfrog

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and easy to see wears and tears
customer_reviews.text: I don't mind the boot being heavy, I have gotten used to this. But I'm surprised how quickly the wears and tears are showing up on the boot. They used to have a "classy" and robust look to them but I can see the leather have cuts and all this quickly. I'm not sure if these will last me years but aside from rapidly deteriorating aesthetics, they're good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Adi

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I use these for working around the house/yardwork and I can say they are comfortable but heavy. I knew they would be because of a previous review. As to waterproof, they are fine with moderate water spray and If I need more protection, Ill spray scotch guard on them.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent P

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof boots is what I need
customer_reviews.text: I was interested in this purchase due to real leather uppers, and waterproof. I am preparing for a possible very wet Winter, according to La Nina ocean water temperatures. Once a boy scout, always a boy scout............ BE PREPARED.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Mark

customer_reviews.title: I work, these boots dont show it though. :-)
customer_reviews.text: I've had them 4 months and have nothing negative to report. A few times I applied mink oil. I do irrigation work and have been for 12 years, so the shoes are getting wet and worked often. I do not see any wear or seams coming apart yet. I also forsee these shoes to last for many many more months. I would buy them again
customer_reviews.author: lkn

customer_reviews.title: Crushes my Achilles tendon
customer_reviews.text: Extremely uncomfortable after wearing for more than 30 minutes. Achilles tendon is bruised. Donated these to Goodwill after 3 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: sizes are off and need better description of
customer_reviews.text: we tried these on at a store and 10.5 w fit perfect but they could only fine one shoe. we ordered on line and the first pair was too large and now the second pair is a little tight. they need a better description of what the letters mean wide, narrow, extra wide, half.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Casper

customer_reviews.title: good traction in the snow
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots because I thought the deep lug soles would be better in the snow than my current boots and they certainly are. Good trail boots. The laces are a little tight in the eyelets to lace up but that's my only criticism.
customer_reviews.author: Handyman

customer_reviews.title: Look and feel - good quality
customer_reviews.text: I hate hate hate returning shoes. . . but these were half size too small. I am a true size 9M . . . the Skechers 9M smashed my toes . . . the 9 1/2 fits me perfectly. Now, I love the way these shoes feel . . . so comfortable. The quality seems good . . . the price was right.Durability? If they hold up to some normal abuse, these are my go to work shoes.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bow

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad boot at all but.....
customer_reviews.text: Bought these at the end of Dec 2019. Great boot. I have always liked the Sketcher boots. This pair, there is already a hole in the memory foam insert that comes in the boot. It broke down very fast. After only 2 months and a week an a half, you would think they would hold up a bit longer. Boot is great, insert is not.
customer_reviews.author: Brister

customer_reviews.title: Great boot..
customer_reviews.text: Is my 3rd pair and have to say is a great boot and durable, will last as I put mine through the test with my job, Only down fall is not so comfortable at first until broken in and suggest a better insert for comfort, Otherwise is A+
customer_reviews.author: Tony C.

customer_reviews.title: Still breaking them in but they are already very comfortable. I normally wear a 91/2 D but ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: Still breaking them in but they are already very comfortable. I normally wear a 91/2 D but ordered these in 10 D because I didn't want them tight and while they were a little larger not as large as I expected of a 10.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace an old pair of work boots. The Sketchers run a little narrow so I had to exchange. The wider fits me much better. These seem to have good support and are comfortable. My son tried them on and loved them so he’ll be getting a pair now too.
customer_reviews.author: Libby's MumMum

customer_reviews.title: Takes awhile to break in
customer_reviews.text: After 3 12 hr days the leather has broken in, started off very tight now they are fine, soles have broken in some, but not enough. Should be great in a week or so. The memory foam is not as thick or as soft as the shoes so don't expect that.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Good quality boot
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome sturdy boot. I was a little hesitant to buy these for my husband. Only because the sketchers I've bought my kiddos have been crap. They fall apart way too fast for a kid shoe. Anyway, the adult shoes and boot she are a really good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Stiff and not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These boots run small. I wear an 8 shoe and bought an 8.5 boot, but it was still small. I found the boots to be very stiff and uncomfortable. I need a new pair of boots, but will go to the store and try them on.
customer_reviews.author: Nanny

product_meta.title: Skechers Men's Verdict Men's Boot
product_meta.description:
* Get on your daily grind with these rough and tough ankle boots from Skechers®.
 * Leather upper.
 * Lace-up front.
 * Padded collar for added comfort.
 * Lightly padded insole.
 * Synthetic lug outsole.
 * Measurements: *  Heel Height: 1 1⁄2 in
    *  Weight: 1 lb 14 oz
    *  Shaft: 5 in
    *  Platform Height: 1 in
   
   
 * Product measurements were taken using size 11.5, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size.
 * Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Work boot featuring waterproof leather upper, padded tongue and collar, and lugged rubber outsole
